product_description: Sparkle and Bash Wedding Theme Facial Tissues embody a refined mix of style and utility, suitable for those seeking sophistication in their daily necessities. This 24-count bulk set of 3-ply travel tissues is crafted to cater to individuals who value aesthetics alongside practicality. As winter approaches, these face tissues become an essential accessory for addressing the impact of cold weather on the skin. Their compact size makes them suitable for travelers who require reliable on-the-go essentials, students, or professionals in need of convenient purse mini essentials. These pocket-sized tissues fit seamlessly into a purse, a tissue car holder, or serve as a thoughtful inclusion in wedding welcome bag stuffers. Made from natural pulp paper, each tissue provides softness and absorbency, ensuring gentle care for your skin. Unfolding to a size of 8.6 x 8.6 inches, they provide ample coverage while maintaining a travel-friendly format. The smart flap pocket design keeps them clean and protected, making them suitable as souvenirs for guests or as a stylish addition to any event. Suitable for use as tissues for car storage or travel size tissue packs for winter trips, Sparkle and Bash Facial Tissues combine reliability and style. Enhance your special occasions such as Valentine's Day with these elegant tissues, ideal for romantic gifting or as a memento to express care and thoughtfulness. Whether used as bulk hygiene supplies or as a complement to other travel size items, these tissues add a touch of flair to both everyday life and important celebrations.

Our soft, durable, thick 3-layer facial tissues in a convenient travel pack—small enough to fit in pockets, purses, backpacks or travel bags—are ultra-absorbent for runny noses and watery eyes to help you stay prepared wherever you are. Plus, you can find one of these Kleenex travel tissue packs that fits the occasion because each pack of tissues is available in various colors and designs. Got the sniffles?
